definition: harming others for one's personal benefit (idiom); personal gain to the detriment of others
to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
surname Li
sharp/favorable/advantage/benefit/profit/interest/to do good to/to benefit
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa

sentences.english: The only rule of the market place was dog-eat-dog .
sentences.chinese: 市场上的唯一准则是损人利己。

sentences.english: Never do anything to your profit at another's expense.
sentences.chinese: 切不可作任何损人利己的事。

personal profit/to benefit oneself
to see profit and forget morality (idiom); to act from mercenary considerations/to sell one's soul for gain

everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
to harm others/to mock people/to taunt/humiliating
to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
